title: LG V30 vs Galaxy S8: Which 2017 Android flagship is best?
description: ![]()For the full, end-to-end premium smartphone experience, then, you may bebetter served by the Samsung Galaxy S8 – but those looking for somethingdifferent should take a long hard look at the LG V30. It might just satisfy,or even exceed, your needs.We don’t yet know how much the V30 will cost, or even when it will hit themarket, and as such it’s impossible to compare value. But considering thehigh-end features, we’d expect it to be in the same price range as the £689Galaxy S8.**Which Android flagship floats your boat? Let us know on Twitter@trustedreviews**
